posts.post_content:
I need the following t206 HOF'er portraits SGC 40-50 only:
Chesbro
Huggins
Johnson (20-40)
Keeler
Marquard
Mathewson (20-40)
McGraw (no cap)
I also need Cobb (red or green) & Young but probably can't afford them. Maybe a nicely trimmed A or possibly 10-20 (not too beat on front)
Send scans and prices to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
